installation.script:
# NodeJS discord.js installer

echo "Installer will start in 5 secconds"
sleep 1
echo "Installer will start in 4 secconds"
sleep 1
echo "Installer will start in 3 secconds"
sleep 1
echo "Installer will start in 2 secconds"
sleep 1
echo "Installer will start in 1 secconds"
sleep 1
echo -e               "####################################################################"
echo -e "#\033[1;39;44m     _  __               ____                                     \033[0m#"
echo -e "#\033[1;39;44m    / |/ /_ ____ _____  / __/__ _____  _____ _______  ___ __ __   \033[0m#"
echo -e "#\033[1;39;44m   /    / // /\ \ / _ \_\ \/ -_) __/ |/ / -_) __(_-<_/ -_) // /   \033[0m#"
echo -e "#\033[1;39;44m  /_/|_/\_, //_\_\​\___/___/\__/_/  |___/\__/_/ /___(_)__/\_,_/    \033[0m#"
echo -e "#\033[1;39;44m       /___/                                                      \033[0m#"
echo -e               "####################################################################"
echo -e ""
echo -e "Installer is starting... "

if [ $GIT_DOWNLOAD = 1 ]; then
    echo "Removing all files..."
    rm -rf /mnt/server/*
    echo "Pulling all"
    git clone $GIT_REPO
    name=$(basename "$GIT_REPO")
    cp -r ${name%.git}/. /mnt/server/
    echo "Done!"
else
    rm -rf /mnt/server/*
    echo Downloading example files...
    downloader https://raw.githubusercontent.com/NyxoServers/eggs/refs/heads/master/bots/discord/langs/python/bot.py /mnt/server/bot.py
    downloader https://raw.githubusercontent.com/NyxoServers/eggs/refs/heads/master/bots/discord/langs/python/requirements.txt /mnt/server/requirements.txt
    echo "Done!"
fi
